attributes.action: lower transport and entertainment prices for students.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: being able to tour our capital is being made impossible for young students like myself. as it stands, children over 16 are being classed as adults and made to pay 12.50 for a travel card, so they can do something worthwhile and to be kept out of trouble. however, due to the absurd increasing prices, this luxury will soon to become a thing of the past.
